info.name: GyanSetu API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for GyanSetu Backend - Adaptive Mastery & Engagement Platform

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: User registration, login, and authentication endpoints. WHY: Essential for securing the platform and managing user access with role-based permissions.

request.description: Register a new user with email, password, role, and optional name. WHY: Creates user accounts for teachers, students, and admins with proper role-based access control.
Register a student user. WHY: Separate endpoint example for student registration.
Register a parent user linked to an existing student.
Login with email and password. Returns JWT token for authentication. WHY: Authenticates users and provides access tokens for subsequent API calls.
Get current authenticated user information. WHY: Validates token and retrieves user profile for session management.

item.name: üè´ Classroom Management
item.description: Classroom creation, joining, and student management. WHY: Enables teachers to create classrooms and students to join via join codes for organized learning environments.

request.description: Create a new classroom. Auto-generates join code. WHY: Teachers can create classrooms for specific courses and academic years with unique join codes for easy student enrollment.
Join a classroom using the join code. WHY: Students can easily join classrooms without needing to know the exact class ID, improving UX.
Get classroom details including teacher and students. WHY: Retrieves complete classroom information for dashboards and management.
Get all students enrolled in a class. WHY: Enables teachers to view and manage class roster.

item.name: üìö Curriculum Management
item.description: Create and manage curriculum structure: Subjects ‚Üí Modules ‚Üí Concepts. WHY: Establishes the learning hierarchy that powers mastery tracking and adaptive learning.

request.description: Create a new subject. WHY: Defines the top-level curriculum category (e.g., DSA, Computer Networks) that contains modules and concepts.
Get all available subjects. WHY: Lists all subjects for curriculum selection and display.
Get specific subject details. WHY: Retrieves subject information including modules and concepts.
Create a module within a subject. WHY: Organizes concepts into logical groups (e.g., Trees, Arrays) within a subject for better curriculum structure.
Get all modules for a subject. WHY: Lists all modules in a subject for curriculum navigation.
Create a concept within a module. WHY: Defines individual learning concepts that can be tracked for mastery (e.g., DFS, BFS, Binary Search).
Get all concepts in a module. WHY: Lists all concepts within a module for assessment creation and mastery tracking.
Get complete curriculum structure for a subject (with all modules and concepts). WHY: Retrieves the entire curriculum hierarchy for display and navigation.

item.name: üß† Mastery Engine
item.description: Bayesian Knowledge Tracing (BKT) based mastery tracking. WHY: Provides explainable, adaptive learning intelligence that tracks student mastery at concept, module, and subject levels.

request.description: Update concept mastery after answering a question. WHY: Core endpoint that updates BKT mastery probabilities based on student performance and engagement.
Get mastery for a specific concept. WHY: Retrieves individual concept mastery score (0-100) and probability for student dashboards.
Get mastery for a module (aggregated from concepts). WHY: Calculates average mastery across all concepts in a module for progress tracking.
Get subject mastery dashboard. WHY: Provides comprehensive mastery view with module breakdowns and status indicators.
Get adaptive practice plan based on ZPD. WHY: Generates personalized practice recommendations (remedial/core/stretch) using Zone of Proximal Development.
Get overall mastery across all concepts. WHY: Provides aggregate mastery score for student progress overview.
Get students with mastery below threshold. WHY: Identifies students needing intervention for early support.

item.name: üß™ Assessments
item.description: Create and manage assessments (manual or AI-generated). WHY: Enables teachers to evaluate student learning and automatically update mastery tracking.

request.description: Create a manual assessment with custom questions. WHY: Allows teachers to create assessments with full control over question content and concept mapping.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "DFS Practice Quiz",
  "description": "AI-generated quiz on DFS",
  "classId": "{{class_id}}",
  "subjectId": "{{subject_id}}",
  "topic": "Depth First Search",
  "difficulty": "MEDIUM",
  "questionCount": 5,
  "conceptId": "{{concept_id}}"
}

request.description: Generate assessment using Gemini AI. WHY: Saves time by automatically generating MCQ questions based on topic and difficulty level.
Launch an assessment to make it available to students. WHY: Changes assessment status from DRAFT to LAUNCHED so students can take it.
Get assessment details. WHY: Retrieves assessment information including questions (for students when launched).
Submit assessment answers. WHY: Records student responses, calculates score, and automatically updates mastery for each concept.
Get assessment results and statistics. WHY: Provides teacher view of all student submissions with aggregated statistics.
Get student's own attempt. WHY: Allows students to view their submitted answers and scores.

item.name: ‚ö° Engagement Tracking
item.description: Track student engagement in real-time. WHY: Monitors student activity, confusion signals, and engagement metrics for proactive intervention.

request.description: Log student engagement metrics. WHY: Records engagement data (idle time, interactions, tab focus) for real-time monitoring and alerts.
Get engagement data for entire class. WHY: Provides teacher dashboard with class-wide engagement metrics and individual student data.
Get engagement data for a specific student. WHY: Tracks individual student engagement across all classes for progress monitoring.

item.name: üö® Alerts
item.description: Real-time confusion and engagement alerts. WHY: Provides immediate notifications to teachers when students need intervention.

request.description: Get all alerts for a class. WHY: Retrieves confusion signals, engagement drops, and mastery threshold alerts for teacher intervention.
Mark an alert as resolved. WHY: Allows teachers to acknowledge and close alerts after addressing student needs.

item.name: üëë Admin
item.description: Admin features for content templates and institutional metrics. WHY: Enables workload reduction through reusable content and provides unified institutional reporting.

request.description: Create a content template (PROJECT, ASSESSMENT, or RUBRIC). WHY: Enables admins to create reusable templates that reduce teacher workload.
Get templates with optional filters. WHY: Allows teachers to search and use available templates for faster content creation.
Get institutional metrics dashboard. WHY: Provides unified reporting with Mastery Rate, Teacher Adoption Rate, and Administrative Confidence Score.

item.name: üì¶ Project-Based Learning (PBL)
item.description: Manage projects, teams, and artifacts. WHY: Supports collaborative learning through structured project execution and peer assessment.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Smart Traffic System",
  "description": "IoT-based traffic management project",
  "classId": "{{class_id}}",
  "milestones": ["Design", "Prototype", "Testing"],
  "rubrics": ["Teamwork", "Creativity", "Technical Skills"]
}

request.description: Create a new PBL project. WHY: Enables teachers to create structured projects with milestones and rubrics for collaborative learning.
Get project details including teams and artifacts. WHY: Retrieves complete project information for management and progress tracking.
Create a team for a project. WHY: Enables team formation for collaborative project work.
Submit project artifact (link or text). WHY: Allows teams to submit project deliverables for evaluation.

item.name: ü§ù Soft Skills
item.description: Peer review and soft skill assessment. WHY: Enables objective evaluation of teamwork, communication, and leadership through peer feedback.

request.description: Submit peer review ratings. WHY: Captures peer feedback on soft skills for comprehensive student evaluation.
Get aggregated soft skill scores for a student. WHY: Provides comprehensive view of student's soft skills based on peer reviews.

item.name: üìä Dashboards
item.description: Analytics and reporting dashboards. WHY: Provides actionable insights for teachers and administrators to monitor learning outcomes.

request.description: Get teacher analytics dashboard. WHY: Provides comprehensive view of classes, students, mastery, engagement, and alerts for teachers.
Get admin institutional dashboard. WHY: Provides system-wide metrics for institutional reporting and decision-making.

item.name: üêç Python Mastery Backend
item.description: Direct Python BKT engine endpoints (for testing/integration). WHY: These endpoints are called by Node.js backend but can be tested directly for BKT engine validation.

request.description: Check Python backend health.
Update mastery in Python backend (called by Node.js).
Get concept mastery from Python backend.
Get adaptive practice plan from Python backend.

item.name: üîå WebSocket Testing
item.description: Real-time WebSocket events for live classroom sessions, anonymous participation, confusion signals, engagement indicators, and polls. Namespace: /classroom. Note: Postman has limited Socket.IO support. Use the provided HTML test page or browser console for full testing.

item.name: üìà Teacher Learning Pace
item.description: Learning velocity tracking, at-risk detection, and class pace overview.

request.description: Generate mock historical mastery snapshots for testing learning pace features.
Get overview of students classified by learning pace (Fast, Steady, Plateaued, Struggling).
Identify students at risk based on low mastery and negative velocity.
Get detailed learning velocity metrics for a specific student.
Check backend server health status.

item.name: üìÖ Attendance
item.description: Attendance tracking. WHY: Allows fetching attendance history for students, parents, and teachers.

request.description: Get attendance history for the logged-in student.
Get attendance history for a specific student ID.
Get attendance records for a specific class.
